name: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
description:
Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return is a puzzle game developed by Black Lantern Studios. It was originally released in 2014. GameMill Entertainment published the game.
You can play Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return on Nintendo 3DS.
Bonne Radford, Roland Carroll and Ryan Carroll produced the game. It was directed by Daniel St. Pierre, Dan St. Pierre and Will Finn. It was scored by Toby Chu.
